#summary The efficiencies of different eviction algorithms.

==== _Observations_ ====
  # _Second Chance_ always provides the best or comparable hit rates.
  # _Second Chance_ combines strengths of _FIFO_ and _MFU_ cache strategies.
  # Two factors and their interaction account for most of the variation for all replacement strategies.
